overview.name: Speaker
overview.description: This company is listed as an Alexa Partner Manufacturer. AddOn makes many speaker-related products so it's likely that the Echo Dot's speaker hardware is sourced from here

location.address: AddOn Technology facility, 1f No. 14 Lane 53 Sec. 4 Sin Yi Rd, Taipei, 106, Taiwan

overview.name: Bluetooth/Wifi Chip
overview.description: The chip in the Amazon Echo Dot that provides Bluetooth and Wifi capabilities has MediaTek inscribed on it.

location.address: MediaTek Headquarters, No.1, Dusing 1st Rd., Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu, 30078, Taiwan

overview.name: Main Chip
overview.description: This chips works with the processor, RAM, and storage.

location.address: MediaTek Headquarters, No.1, Dusing 1st Rd., Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu, 30078, Taiwan

overview.name: Audio Chip
overview.description: This supplier worked with Amazon to produce the 4th generation version which came before this one. It's likely that they used the same supplier, since not many major changes occurred between the generations

location.address: MediaTek Headquarters, No.1, Dusing 1st Rd., Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu, 30078, Taiwan

overview.name: DRAM
overview.description: 4th Gen supplier. DRAM (Dynamic Random Access Memory) chips function as the computer's main memory system

overview.name: Flash memory
overview.description: This supplier worked with Amazon to produce the 4th generation version which came before this one. It's likely that they used the same supplier, since not many major changes occurred between the generations

overview.name: Clock Oscillator
overview.description: Clock oscillators serve as a timing agent for the microprocessor. This supplier worked with Amazon to produce the 4th generation version which came before this one. It's likely that they used the same supplier, since not many major changes occurred between the generations

overview.name: Connector
overview.description: This includes wiring and ribbon cables within the product. This supplier worked with Amazon to produce the 4th generation version which came before this one. It's likely that they used the same supplier, since not many major changes occurred between the generations

overview.name: Assembly
overview.description: Many articles have been released surrounding child labor and unfair wages at Amazon's FoxConn facility in Hengyang, China
